Question: This person went with her, sending in dispatches for the newspaper PM, but in general he disliked China.
Hints: In fact, during World War II, Salinger met and corresponded with this person, whom he acknowledged as an influence.
Müller reports that this person "has the highest recognition value of all writers worldwide".
In the spring of 1939, this person crossed to Cuba in his boat to live in the Hotel Ambos Mundos in Havana.
